Uses of Class
com.rivelbop.rivelworks.physics2d.body.PhysicsBody2D

  • Packages that use PhysicsBody 
    Package Description
    com.rivelbop.rivelworks.physics2d.body  
    com.rivelbop.rivelworks.physics2d.joint  

    • Uses of PhysicsBody in com.rivelbop.rivelworks.physics2d.body

      Subclasses of PhysicsBody in com.rivelbop.rivelworks.physics2d.body 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DynamicBody
      An extension of PhysicsBody, used to create dynamic bodies.
      class  KinematicBody
      An extension of PhysicsBody, used to create kinematic bodies.
      class  StaticBody
      An extension of PhysicsBody, used to create static bodies.

    • Uses of PhysicsBody in com.rivelbop.rivelworks.physics2d.joint

      Constructors in com.rivelbop.rivelworks.physics2d.joint with parameters of type PhysicsBody 
      Constructor and Description
      JointDistance(com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.World world, PhysicsBody bodyA, PhysicsBody bodyB, float length, boolean collideConnected)
      Creates a distance joint by providing just the length instead of the specific coordinates, takes in the wrapped physics bodies instead of the LibGDX defaults.
      JointDistance(com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.World world, PhysicsBody bodyA, PhysicsBody bodyB, float x1, float y1, float x2, float y2, boolean collideConnected)
      A more customized variant of a distance joint, takes in the wrapped physics bodies instead of the LibGDX defaults.
      JointFriction(com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.World world, PhysicsBody bodyA, PhysicsBody bodyB, float maxForce, float maxTorque, boolean collideConnected)
      Creates a friction joint without an anchor point, takes in the wrapped physics bodies instead of the LibGDX defaults.
      JointFriction(com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.World world, PhysicsBody bodyA, PhysicsBody bodyB, float x, float y, float maxForce, float maxTorque, boolean collideConnected)
      Creates a friction joint with the specified anchor point, takes in the wrapped physics bodies instead of the LibGDX defaults.
      JointGear(com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.World world, PhysicsBody bodyA, PhysicsBody bodyB, JointRevolute joint1, JointPrismatic joint2, float ratio, boolean collideConnected)
      Creates a gear joint, you specify a gear ratio to bind the motions together: coordinate1 + ratio * coordinate2 = constant The ratio can be negative or positive.
      JointMotor(com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.World world, PhysicsBody bodyA, PhysicsBody bodyB, float maxForce, float maxTorque, boolean collideConnected)
      Creates a motor joint without specifying the correction factor.
      JointMotor(com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.World world, PhysicsBody bodyA, PhysicsBody bodyB, float correctionFactor, float maxForce, float maxTorque, boolean collideConnected)
      Creates a motor joint, you must additionally specify the correction factor.
      JointMouse(com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.World world, PhysicsBody bodyA, PhysicsBody bodyB)
      Creates a mouse joint.
      JointPrismatic(com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.World world, PhysicsBody bodyA, PhysicsBody bodyB, float lowerTranslation, float upperTranslation, float maxMotorForce, float motorSpeed, boolean enableLimit, boolean enableMotor, boolean collideConnected)
      Creates a prismatic joint.
      JointPulley(com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.World world, PhysicsBody bodyA, PhysicsBody bodyB, com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 groundAnchorA, com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 groundAnchorB, com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 anchorA, com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 anchorB, float ratio, boolean collideConnected)
      Creates a pulley joint.
      JointRevolute(com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.World world, PhysicsBody bodyA, PhysicsBody bodyB, com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 anchor, float lowerAngle, float upperAngle, float maxMotorTorque, float motorSpeed, boolean enableLimit, boolean enableMotor, boolean collideConnected)
      Creates a revolute joint.
      JointRope(com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.World world, PhysicsBody bodyA, PhysicsBody bodyB, boolean collideConnected)
      Creates a rope joint.
      JointWeld(com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.World world, PhysicsBody bodyA, PhysicsBody bodyB, com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 anchor, boolean collideConnected)
      Creates a weld joint.
      JointWheel(com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.World world, PhysicsBody bodyA, PhysicsBody bodyB, com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 anchor, com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 axis, float maxMotorTorque, float motorSpeed, float dampingRatio, boolean collideConnected)
      Creates a wheel joint.
